name: SpanishSpellingTool
0:
”Alexa, ask Spanish Spelling Tool to spell Monday”
”Alexa, ask Spanish Spelling Tool to spell January”
”Alexa, ask Spanish Spelling Tool to spell the current month”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spanish spelling tool
des: This skill will provide a quick way to ask for the Spanish spelling of the current day of the week or the current month, as well as a given day or month.
